content.4: Therefore prophesy against them, prophesy, O son of man.
content.6: Ye have multiplied your slain in this city, and ye have filled the streets thereof with the slain.
content.8: Ye have feared the sword; and I will bring a sword upon you, saith the Lord
content.9: And I will bring you out of the midst thereof, and deliver you into the hands of strangers, and will execute judgments among you.
content.10: Ye shall fall by the sword; I will judge you in the border of Israel; and ye shall know that I

content.13: And it came to pass, when I prophesied, that Pelatiah the son of Benaiah died. Then fell I down upon my face, and cried with a loud voice, and said, Ah Lord
content.16: Therefore say, Thus saith the Lord
content.17: Therefore say, Thus saith the Lord
content.18: And they shall come thither, and they shall take away all the detestable things thereof and all the abominations thereof from thence.
content.19: And I will give them one heart, and I will put a new spirit within you; and I will take the stony heart out of their flesh, and will give them an heart of flesh:
content.20: That they may walk in my statutes, and keep mine ordinances, and do them: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God.
content.22: Then did the cherubims lift up their wings, and the wheels beside them; and the glory of the God of Israel
content.24: Afterwards the spirit took me up, and brought me in a vision by the Spirit of God into Chaldea, to them of the captivity. So the vision that I had seen went up from me.
